title: Peter King (American politician)
added: King identifies as “pro-life”.<ref>www.nytimes.com/1992/10/18/nyregion/abortion-is-a-key-issue-in-kingorlins-contest.html</ref> While in congress, King consistently received a score of 0%, from NARAL-Pro Choice America, an abortion rights organization.<ref>www.prochoiceamerica.org/representative/peter-king/</ref> When asked at the Republican National Convention in 2012, King said, “[The] main purpose of government is to protect innocent life, no matter where that life is.” In the same interview, King said a woman should not be punished for getting an abortion but doctors who perform the procedure should be.<ref>www.democracynow.org/2012/8/30/new_york_congressman_peter_king_criminalize Retrieved January 2, 2020.</ref>
